Title: Iron Monkey
Writer: Tan Cheung, Richard Epcar, Tai-Mok Lau, Elsa Tang, Hark Tsui
Actors: Rongguang Yu, Donnie Yen, Jean Wang, Sze-Man Tsang
Plot: A Hong Kong variation on Robin Hood. The corrupt officials of a Chinese village are continually robbed by a masked bandit know as "Iron Monkey" named after a benevolent deity. When all else fails, the Govenor forces a traveling physician (Donnie Yen) into finding the bandit. The arrival of an evil Shaolin monk, brings the Physician and Iron Monkey together to battle the corrupt government.
